owner.description: The account owner of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

repo.description: The name of the repository without the `.git` extension. The name is not case sensitive.

path.description: Relative path of the file to comment on.

position.description: Line index in the diff to comment on.

line.description: **Closing down notice**. Use **position** parameter instead. Line number in the file to comment on.
